page.title: 13WITCHES OF WARBOYS
page.content: Warboys is known for its witches. There is a sign of a witch on the clock tower, on the village sign, on the school badge and in many other places. In 1589 a family called Throckmorton moved into the Manor House next to the church.All five girls in the family started to have fits.When an old lady called Alice Samuel visited them the girls accused her of being a witch and of causing the fits. Two doctors could not cure the girls. Sometimes the old lady admitted she was a witch,sometimes she denied it. The fits continued and later, Alice Samuel, her husband and her daughter were taken to Huntingdon jail and tried for witchcraft.They were found guilty and hung.Their bodies were exhibited to the public. Nobody knows what happened to the girls.
